properties.name: app.task-activity.list.sort.date-direction
properties.description: Sort direction for task date column in the task activity list. Valid values: 'ASC' (ascending) or 'DESC' (descending). Default: 'DESC' (newest first).

properties.name: app.task-activity.list.sort.client-direction
properties.description: Sort direction for client column in the task activity list. Valid values: 'ASC' (ascending) or 'DESC' (descending). Default: 'ASC' (alphabetical).

properties.name: app.task-activity.list.sort.project-direction
properties.description: Sort direction for project column in the task activity list. Valid values: 'ASC' (ascending) or 'DESC' (descending). Default: 'ASC' (alphabetical).

properties.name: app.admin.initial-password
properties.description: Initial password for the admin user created during application startup. This is only used when the admin user doesn't already exist in the database.

properties.name: cors.allowed-origins
properties.description: Comma-separated list of allowed origins for CORS requests. Use '*' to allow all origins (not recommended for production).

properties.name: cors.allowed-methods
properties.description: Comma-separated list of allowed HTTP methods for CORS requests.

properties.name: cors.allowed-headers
properties.description: Comma-separated list of allowed headers for CORS requests. Use '*' to allow all headers.

properties.name: cors.allow-credentials
properties.description: Whether to allow credentials (cookies, authorization headers) in CORS requests.
